creator: gp.ciceri@suddenthinks.com
text:
Trying to create a new user, like in 
http://olr.kbs.uni-hannover.de:8888/blog/admin/users.html?lenya.usecase=userAddUser 
 
I take, 
 
File 
[/home/roku/jesse/cocoon-lenya/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/pubs/blog/config/ac/policies/admin/users/test.html/subtree-policy.acml] 
could not be created. 
 
java.lang.IllegalStateException: File 
[/home/roku/jesse/cocoon-lenya/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/pubs/blog/config/ac/policies/admin/users/test.html/subtree-policy.acml] 
could not be created. 
 
 
This happens on the cvs, I think. 
Regards 
/gp
The FilePolicyManager tried to create the file despite it already existed.
creator: andreas@apache.org
